name: Roller Derby (KCPorteous)
description:
Are you ready for the roller derby, try to reach the top! The objective of this game is to get the truck to the finish line, to do this you must navigate you way through different terrains. Use the slider to change gears and speed so that you don't crash.

Credit:
Kira Zingamark: Project Manager, Designer
Jacob Duniam: Lead Designer
Alex Bryant: Leader Programmer
Kellem Porteous: Programmer
Alexander Luthe: Programmer
